activities:
Oriel may receive and process personal information from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland under the following circumstances:
a.  HR/employee data is processed for management, administrative and staffing purposes.
b.  Investigator and CRO staff data is processed for regulatory and clinical trial oversight purposes.
c.  Data from other third parties such as consultants and suppliers may be processed in the normal conduct of business.
d.  Coded data from clinical studies run in the UK may be recorded in clinical study reports and submitted to the FDA in the normal US drug approval process.
contacttitle1: Privacy Officer, Director of Clinical Trials
personaldata: Off-line, on-line and manually processed clinical trial and organization data.
recoursemech: The EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for EU data and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for Swiss data.
